name: Rogue Runner (itch) (Projector Studios)
description:
(Early Early Access)

:: Use Cursor Keys to move ::

Run the infinite depths of the realms darkest dungeon
in this endless roguelike runner action-RPG
from the creators of some games you've never heard of.

Play releases from the very start of development.
Planned features include:

  • A randomly generated dungeon on each play.
  • Lots of treasure and items
  • Loads of characters to unlock with abilites and and impediments.
  • A variety of realms to explore

Let's see where it goes...
